about_the_game:
About This Content
The While Waiting Artbook is a must-have companion for fans of the game. Packed with exclusive content, this DLC gives you a glimpse behind the scenes, revealing the creative process and hidden gems that shaped the game you love. Whether you're an art enthusiast, a game developer, or just someone who enjoyed While Waiting, this artbook is your ticket to dive deeper into its world.

Featuring:

  • Concept Art – Explore how the world of While Waiting came to life, from initial sketches to fully realized designs. See the evolution of characters, environments, and key moments in the game.

  • Sketches & Doodles – Peek into the raw and unfiltered creative process with various sketches, ideas, and discarded concepts.

  • Exclusive Comics – Enjoy a collection of additional comics that expand the universe of While Waiting with humor and heartwarming moments.

Access:
After you purchase the DLC, the artbook will be added as a launch option when you run While Waiting on Steam.
